entry.title: FROST ADVISORY IN EFFECT, Collingwood
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:06 PM EDT Sunday 15 May 2016

entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Collingwood 2:00 PM EDT Sunday 15 May 2016
Temperature: 3.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa rising
Humidity: 81 %
Dewpoint: 0.2°C
Wind: NW 25 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low zero with patchy frost. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light after midnight. Low zero with patchy frost. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 15 May 2016

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny in the morning and early in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon. High 11. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 15 May 2016

entry.title: Monday night: Clearing. Low plus 1 with risk of frost.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing near midnight. Low plus 1 with risk of frost. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 15 May 2016
